Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to making it a misdemeanor to use a city agency or service to harass another person or entity.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Making it a misdemeanor to use a city agency or service to harass another person or entity.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to requiring callers to the 311 system to identify themselves by name and address if the nature of their complaint requires the dispatch of the Police Department, Fire Department or EMS, and making it a crime if such call is a false report.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Requiring callers to the 311 system to identify themselves by name and address.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to making it a crime to operate a motor vehicle or construction vehicle while intoxicated or impaired by drugs at a construction site or to enter upon a construction site under the influence of alcohol or drugs.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Making it a crime to operate a motor vehicle or construction vehicle while intoxicated or impaired by drugs.

Items.MinutesNote: Other Council Members Attending: Addabbo and Lopez

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to making it a misdemeanor to use a city agency or service to harass another person or entity.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Laid Over by Committee
Items.MatterName: Making it a misdemeanor to use a city agency or service to harass another person or entity.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to requiring callers to the 311 system to identify themselves by name and address if the nature of their complaint requires the dispatch of the Police Department, Fire Department or EMS, and making it a crime if such call is a false report.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Laid Over by Committee
Items.MatterName: Requiring callers to the 311 system to identify themselves by name and address.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to making it a crime to operate a motor vehicle or construction vehicle while intoxicated or impaired by drugs at a construction site or to enter upon a construction site under the influence of alcohol or drugs.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Laid Over by Committee
Items.MatterName: Making it a crime to operate a motor vehicle or construction vehicle while intoxicated or impaired by drugs.
